data.name: CoH 2 - Soviet Commander: Terror Tactics
data.detailed_description:
SOVIET COMMANDER: TERROR TACTICS
A pantheon of combat forces guaranteed to cause fear in your enemy.
  • IL-2 PRECISION BOMBING STRIKE
    The IL-2 will make a high-speed bombing run, clustering four FAB-50 50kg bombs into the target area.
  • FEAR PROPAGANDA ARTILLERY
    Airburst propaganda leaflets make targeted soldiers question the morality of their actions.
  • KV-8 FLAMETHROWER TANK
    A KV-8 Flamethrower Tank can be ordered in to the battlefield.
  • ML-20 152MM GUN-HOWITZER
    The powerful 152mm ML-20 Gun-Howitzer can be built by Combat Engineers. Its shells can reach vast areas of the battlefield.
  • SHOCK TROOPS
    Special Command Troops can be deployed to the battlefield. Click and select location to deploy.
This DLC is already included in the Digital Collector’s Edition.

data.supported_languages:
Czech, English*, French*, German*, Italian, Polish*, Russian*, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
• OS: Windows Vista (32bit), Windows 7
  • Processor: 2Ghz Intel Core2 Duo or Equivalent
  • Memory: 2GB RAM
  • Hard Disk Space: 20GB
  • Video Card: 256MB Direct3D 10 capable video card (GeForce 8800 or RadeonHD 2900)
  • Additional: Internet Connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum Requirements
  • OS OS X 10.10.3
  • Processor 1.8Ghz Intel
  • RAM 4GB
  • Hard Disk 35GB
  • Graphics 512MB (Nvidia 6xx series or later, AMD 7xxx series or later and Intel Iris Pro).
  • Internet Broadband Internet connection
  • Input Keyboard & Mouse
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended Requirements
  • OS OS X 10.10.3
  • Processor 2.4Ghz Intel
  • RAM 8GB
  • Hard Disk 35GB
  • Graphics 4GB (Nvidia 780MX, AMD D700 or R9 295X)
  • Internet Broadband Internet connection
  • Input Keyboard & Mouse

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum Requirements
  • OS Ubuntu 14.04 (64bit) or SteamOS
  • Processor 2.6 GHz Intel Core2 Duo or equivalent.
  • RAM 4GB
  • Hard Disk 35GB
  • Graphics 1GB*
  • Internet Broadband Internet connection
  • Input Keyboard & Mouse
    *Requires an Intel Iris Pro graphics card or an NVIDIA 600 series graphics card or better with driver version 352.21 or later.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended Requirements
  • OS Ubuntu 14.04 (64bit) or SteamOS
  • Processor 3.4 GHz Intel i5 quad core or equivalent.
  • RAM 8GB
  • Hard Disk 35GB
  • Graphics 4GB**
  • Internet Broadband Internet connection
  • Input Keyboard & Mouse
    **NVIDIA 760 series card or better with driver version 352.21 or later.
